# Root Level AI_README

## Project Overview

This is a sample monorepo project for testing the AI_README MCP Server.

## General Conventions

- **Code Style**: Follow TypeScript best practices
- **Naming**: Use camelCase for variables, PascalCase for classes
- **Testing**: Write tests for all new features
- **Documentation**: Keep README files up to date

## Directory Structure

```
sample-monorepo/
├── AI_README.md (this file)
├── apps/
│   ├── frontend/    # Frontend application
│   └── backend/     # Backend API
└── packages/
    └── shared/      # Shared utilities
```

## Important Notes

- This is a monorepo managed with npm workspaces
- Each app has its own AI_README.md with specific conventions
- Always check the local AI_README when working in a specific directory
